name: Andromeda
description: Andromeda is a 2D side-scrolling space shooter game that offers a unique and thought-provoking experience. In this casual adventure, you assume the role of the last remaining human in existence, embarking on a final journey to the galaxy of Andromeda before uploading your consciousness to the mega computer with the rest of humanity. Encounter formidable enemies, collect power-ups, and navigate your way through five challenging levels to discover what lies at the end of your journey.
